titleStmt.title: Moristonus martyr to the glorious memory of the much renowned gentleman, Andrew Ker of Moristoun, who was slain at Buda, July 19. 1686. A funeral elegie. / By Ninian Paterson.
titleStmt.author: Paterson, Ninian, d. 1688.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: cropped, stained, print show-through with much loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
